Official information about covid at UTK available at https://studenthealth.utk.edu/covid-19/. There is a health support form, information about vaccination and therapeutics, and some [suggestions](https://studenthealth.utk.edu/covid-19-what-to-do-if-you-are-sick/) on what to do if you are sick. 

There is no public data on incidence at UTK or guidance on mitigating spread.

For information on conditions in Knox County, TN, besides the info on this site (including info on hospitalizations, wastewater testing, and more), you may also want to see:

* [Knox County Health Department](https://covid.knoxcountytn.gov/case-count.html)
* [CDC page for this county](https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#county-view?list_select_state=Tennessee&data-type=CommunityLevels&list_select_county=47093&null=CommunityLevels)
* [NYT page for this county](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2021/us/knox-tennessee-covid-cases.html)
* [Covid ActNow info on Knoxville metro area](https://covidactnow.org/us/metro/knoxville_tn/?s=37602511)
